name: Darkside
description:
Darkside Hacking is a revolutionary video game that immerses you in the world of hacking. With detailed graphics, intense scenarios, and unique challenges, Darkside Hacking takes you on a high-stakes journey of digital exploration. Become the ultimate hacker and conquer the virtual world of cybersecurity. Experience the thrill and fun of being a hacker as you navigate networks, crack passwords, and protect your assets from malicious attacks. Master the art of hacking and prepare to take your skills to the next level. Play Darkside Hacking today and become the King of Cyber Security.

However, remember that the game world doesn't stop when you log off. You'll need to forge your own enemies, allies, and reputation as you progress at your own pace. As a sandbox game, the ultimate level of skill is up to you. With the addition of custom scripting, there are even more ways to hack into machines. Moreover, the game is based on real UNIX commands, making it easy to pick up for those with prior experience.

for LINUX download, then go to properties -> compatibility and pick proton, if its not there enable in settings then steamplay
If you wish to play on Linux or Mac OS, please join the Discord.
